Translations.Text: With Power (and Skill) did We construct the (mighty Arch of the) heaven : Verily, We are Who create the vastness of space with it
And We have spread out the (spacious) earth: How excellently We do spread out
And of everything We have created pairs: That you may remember and receive guidance
So hasten you then (at once) to Allah: Verily, from Him, I am a Warner to you, clear and open
And make no other object of worship with (Almighty) Allah: Verily, from Him, I am a Warner to you, clear and open
Like this, no messenger came to the peoples before them, but they said (of him) in like manner, an (evil) magician, or a madman
Is this the teaching they have transmitted, one to another? No! They are themselves a people breaking beyond (their) bounds
So turn away from them: Yours is not the blame
And remind (the message) truly teaching the benefits (of the Quran) to the believers
And I (Allah) have only created jinns' and men, that they may worship (and serve) Me
No sustenance do I require from them, nor do I require that they should feed Me
Verily, Allah is the All Providing (Al-Raziq) of the provision— Lord of Power— Supreme, the Almighty (Al-Matin)—
And verily, for the wrongdoers, their portion (of punishment) is like the portion of their fellows (of earlier generations): Then let them not ask Me to hasten (that portion)
Misery, then, to the unbelievers, on account of that Day of theirs which they have been promised
